name: Chicken Cheep
description:
A chicken's fight for survival!

You are a chicken that lives on a farm. You must eat the corn before the other chickens and the farmer have high expectations for you to lay eggs. If you don't lay enough eggs, he sure knows what he'll have for dinner...

Gameplay

The game is seperated in two scenarios: Daytime and nighttime. In the day you must eat corn to get satisfied. If your belly is full, it is easier for you to lay eggs in the nighttime. Laying eggs is controlled by a simple task. Press the ctrl button at the right time.

Music

The music in this game has been made by White Linctus

He is looking for work. Feel free to contact him.

Technical stuff

The game was written in Python 3 with the Pygame framework. It should work on both Windows and Linux. The files have been compiled to a single .exe file, so you don't need to install Python in order to play my game.
